#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  int tc;
  cin>>tc;
  while(tc--)
  {
  string a,b;
  int i,j;
  cin>>a>>b;
  bool flag=0;
  for(i=0;i<=a.length()-b.length();i++)
  {
    j=0;
    while(a[i+j]==b[j])
    j++;
    if(j==b.length())
    {
     flag=1;
     break;
    }
   }
   if(flag)cout<<"1\n";
   else cout<<"0\n";
   }
   return 0;}
